image.title: Cloud Native & Open Source: A Team Lead’s Working Journal

item.title: KubeCon EU 2025 London
item.description:
The countdown to KubeCon EU (London) has begun, and I couldn’t be more thrilled to announce that, for the third year in a row, I’ll have the incredible privilege of attending!

This year is extra special because, for the second time, I’ll be managing a booth alongside my amazing colleagues. Why? Because ReeVo—the company that SIGHUP has now joined—will proudly be a sponsor of this major event!
